sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>samurai</radical> radical and the <kanji>samurai</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: The most famous <kanji>samurai</kanji> in Japanese history was the illustrious <reading>shee</reading>p (<ja>し</ja>) samurai. He wasn't JUST a sheep who learned the ways of the sword, he would use the wool from the sheep enemies he killed to create his armor!
readingInfo: Picture the sheep samurai. Maybe draw him on a piece of paper. He's a sheep wearing wool armor, and he has ram horns on the hilt of his katana.
